column4: midnightoker: well it is a dual core amd proc, so 2 cpus... the mobo supports that proc.. and ubuntu can run on very little cpu, correct?
midnightoker: the VMs will not be very cpu dependent
midnightoker: its just the quad cores are still pricey, and i was trying to do this build in budget :)
Bah, only quads?  I'm talking the boss into an octet CPU setup
